description: Directed by Nishil Sheth, 13th is an upcoming drama series that follows a student and mentor coming together to begin their educational startup.
title: 13th OTT Release Date Revealed: Know Everything About This Drama Series

description: Bridgerton is set to land with its Season 4 in the coming year, 2026. The season will revolve around the second-oldest Bridgerton sibling and his love interest.
title: Bridgerton Season 4 OTT Release Revealed: Know Everything About Plot, Streaming Platform, Cast, and More

description: The Expedition 73 Crew commences the week by configuring advanced physics, blood circulation studies, and more at the International Space Station.
title: Expedition 73 Astronauts Conduct Physics Experiments, Health Research, and Tech Tests on ISS

description: Firefly Aerospace has suffered a setback after the Alpha rocket exploded during a preflight test. The incident, thankfully injury-free, raises concerns about the rocket’s reliability and delays the Lockheed Martin mission. Firefly is taking corrective actions, investigating the failure, and aiming to demonstrate safe and dependable launches in upcoming missions.
title: Firefly Aerospace’s Alpha Rocket Explodes During Ground Preflight Test

description: Jay Kelly is a comedy movie, featuring George Clooney and Adam Sandler in prominent roles. The movie explores the theme of self-discovery amid an identity crisis.
title: Jay Kelly OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch This George Clooney Starrer Movie

description: Researchers from Osaka Metropolitan University developed SORA-DET, a lightweight framework that boosts UAV object detection with higher accuracy and faster speed. Using novel modules like PRepConvBlock and SB-FPN, it delivers strong results with far fewer parameters. The system promises real-world benefits in disaster response, environmental monitoring, and urban planning.
title: Lightweight AI Framework Boosts Speed and Accuracy of UAV Remote Sensing Object Detection

description: Madharaasi is a Tamil thriller movie, written and directed by A.R. Murugadoss. The movie is packed with action and follows a deadly mission to infiltrate an illegal arms syndicate.
title: Madharaasi OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch To Stream Sivakarthikeyan Starrer Online

description: Pawan Kalyan’s They Call Him OG, a gripping action drama directed by Sujeeth, is all set to stream on Netflix after its successful theatrical run. With a powerful storyline about a gangster’s return and intense performances, the film has already become one of 2025’s most talked-about releases.
title: Pawan Kalyan’s They Call Him OG OTT Release Reportedly Revealed: What You Need to Know

description: The Kannada film Doora Theera Yaana, starring Vijay Krishna and Priyanka Kumar, is streaming on SunNXT. Directed by Mansore, it presents a sensitive exploration of love, misunderstandings, and trust through the story of a young couple on a road trip. With critics praising its realistic narrative and simple yet touching direction.
title: Priyanka Kumar’s Doora Theera Yaana Now Streaming on SunNXT: Cast, Plot, and Reception

description: Venus’ distinctive crown-like coronae may be explained by heat trapped beneath a rigid mantle layer, according to recent studies. This discovery provides key insights into the planet’s geological activity and helps researchers compare Venus’ surface evolution to that of other planets in our solar system
title: Scientists May Finally Explain Mysterious Crown-Like Features on Venus

description: The Adobe Premiere app for iOS is now live on the App Store. First listed for pre-order on September 4, it officially launched on Monday. While free to download, certain features need a paid subscription. Adobe says the app closely mirrors its desktop software, with tools like multi-track timeline and dynamic audio waveforms.
title: Adobe Premiere Video Editor App for iOS Is Now Available to Download

description: Amazon’s Great Indian Festival Sale 2025 is offering big discounts on PC accessories, including wireless mice, headphones, printers, and mechanical keyboards. For those who type or game for long hours, a mechanical keyboard can be a worthwhile upgrade. Deals are available on models from brands like HP, Aula, and Redragon.
title: Amazon Sale 2025: Best Deals on Mechanical Keyboards During the Great Indian Festival Sale

description: Samsung Galaxy Tab A11+ was launched in global markets alongside the standard Galaxy Tab A11. The Plus variant comes with a 11-inch display and the One UI 8.0 interface. It will be offered in two colour options with up to 256GB storage. It packs a 7,040mAh battery with support for 25W fast charging.
title: Samsung Galaxy Tab A11+ Launched With 7,040mAh Battery, 11-Inch Display; Will Go on Sale by 2025-End

description: Visa has launched a pilot programme allowing banks and financial institutions to use stablecoins like USDC and EURC for pre-funding cross-border transfers. The move aims to free up working capital, reduce reliance on traditional currency accounts, and accelerate settlement times. Wider rollout is planned in 2026.
title: Visa Direct Tests Stablecoins for Instant Cross-Border Transfers

description: WhatsApp is reportedly developing a new Incognito Mode feature for Meta AI chats, which could offer enhanced privacy and confidentiality. The feature was spotted in the latest WhatsApp beta for Android 2.25.28.1 update. When a user turns on Incognito Mode, the instant messaging service could show users a prompt warning that their conversations will not be recorded for future reference and personalisation.
title: WhatsApp Is Reportedly Working on an Incognito Mode for Meta AI Conversations

description: Amazon Great Indian Festival Sale 2025 is currently live in India with 80 percent discount on electronics and accessories. Popular companies have listed thier latest and flagship robot vacuum cleaners with discounted rates in the ongoing sale. Shoppers can avail additional coupon-based and Amazon Pay-based offers. SBI cardholders will get up to 10 percent instant discount on purchases.
title: Amazon Sale 2025: The Ultmate Deals on Robot Vacuum Cleaners for Hands-Free Cleaning

description: Amazon Great Indian Festival Sale 2025 is offering great discounts on a range of electronics like headphones, smart TVs, phones, smartwatches, true wireless stereo (TWS) headsets, home appliances, washing machines, refrigerators, PCs, and laptops. The sale event is in its second week. The company recently announced that in the first two days of the sale event, it witnessed more than 38 crore visitors in India. Till Amazon's sale is live, customers can get decent discounts on gaming headphones.
title: Amazon Sale 2025: Top Deals on Gaming Headsets Under Rs. 5,000 From Logitech, Razer, Ant Esports, and More

description: The Bombay Stock Exchange has blocked Jetking Infotrain’s preferential issue listing due to plans to allocate 60 percent of proceeds to crypto, mainly Bitcoin. The IT firm had already allotted shares, partially deployed funds, and now faces a 10 percent stock fall. Joint MD Siddharth Bharwani called it unprecedented, while Web3 lawyer Subha Chugh highlighted regulatory gaps. Jetking plans to appeal to the Securities Appellate Tribunal amid ongoing uncertainty over India’s crypto rules.
title: BSE Blocks Jetking’s Crypto-Focussed Share Listing Due to Speculation Risks

description: Google is refreshing its iconic “G” logo after nearly a decade. The company announced on Monday that the new four-colour gradient design, previously seen in Google Search, will replace the older block-style logo from 2015. The updated look will roll out across Google’s platforms and products in the coming days.
title: Google's Iconic 'G' Logo Gets a Glow-Up for the First Time in a Decade

description: Google Pay and other UPI platforms are rolling out a new feature that lets users create custom UPI IDs, similar to Paytm. The privacy-focused update allows people to mask their phone numbers or email IDs during transactions. Setting up a personalised ID is straightforward and can be done in just a few steps.
title: How to Create Personalised UPI IDs on Paytm and Google Pay: A Step-by-Step Guide

description: At a starting price of Rs. 149,900, the iPhone 17 Pro Max is more expensive than the 16 Pro Max at launch. However, it also incorporates more updates under the hood compared to its predecessor. The upgrades include a refreshed rear design, a new telephoto and selfie camera onboard, and the best-ever iPhone battery life. Anyone still using an iPhone 15 Pro Max or older can switch to the 17 Pro Max right away, as it is a promising upgrade.
title: iPhone 17 Pro Max Review: A Supercar Engine in Your Pocket

description: Oppo A6 5G debuted in China on Tuesday, the company announced. The new phone is available on the company’s website in three storage variants and colour options. It packs a 7,000mAh battery with 80W wired fast charging support via a USB Type-C port. It sports a 6.57-inch AMOLED display with up to 240Hz peak touch sampling rate, adaptive refresh rate of up to 120Hz, and 1,400 nits of peak brightness. The handset weighs about 185g and measures 8mm in thickness.
title: Oppo A6 5G Launched With 7,000mAh Battery, 50-Megapixel Rear Camera: Price, Specifications

description: Realme P3 Lite 4G is listed on a e-commerce website in Poland, revealing its specifications and price. The listing shows the phone with Unisoc T7250 chipset and a 6,000mAh battery with support for 15W charging. It has  6.67-inch display and  IP54 rated build. The handset is listed in 8GB RAM + 256GB storage option.
title: Realme P3 Lite 4G Price, Specifications Revealed via Retail Listing: Expected Price, Specifications

description: If purchasing a smart bulb is on your shopping list this festive season, then several great deals on smart bulbs can be availed of during the ongoing Amazon Great Indian Festival sale. The Philips WiZ 9W E27 Smart Bulb is currently selling for Rs. 449, down from its list price of Rs. 1,999.In addition to discounts, eligible customers can avail themselves of additional benefits during the sale period.
title: Amazon Sale 2025: Best Deals on Smart Bulbs From AmazonBasics, Phillips, Wipro, and More

description: Anthropic has launched Claude Sonnet 4.5, calling it its most advanced coding model yet. The AI firm says it offers upgrades in coding, reasoning, agentic operations, and domain knowledge, with the ability to run tasks autonomously for up to 30 hours. The model is available via Claude’s website, apps, API, Claude Code, and a Chrome extension.
title: Anthropic’s Claude Sonnet 4.5 AI Model Introduced as the ‘Best Coding Model in the World’

description: iQOO 15 will be unveiled by the smartphone maker in China next month. The company has been revealing the design and colourways of the upcoming handset online. Now, the tech firm has shared a few camera samples taken with the upcoming iQOO 15, showcasing its zooming capabilities. On top of this, the key specifications of the smartphone have been leaked online, hinting at what it might offer. It will reportedly debut in India in November or December.
title: iQOO 15 Key Specifications Leaked; Company Teases Telephoto Camera Performance

description: Samsung Galaxy M07 is now listed on Amazon India website for sale. The listing has revealed the price of the phone, but Samsung has not made any official announcement regarding its India launch yet. The Samsung Galaxy M07 is listed with 6.7-inch display and entry-level price tag. It runs on an octa-core MediaTek Helio G99 chipset and has dual rear cameras.
title: Samsung Galaxy M07 With 5,000mAh Battery Listed on Amazon Ahead of Launch: Price, Specifications

description: Bitcoin traded near $114,000 on Tuesday as gold’s rally and whale activity boosted sentiment. Ethereum surged close to $4,200, supported by institutional interest and healthy reserves. The global crypto market cap crossed $4 trillion, signalling strong liquidity inflows. Analysts see seasonal “Uptober” tailwinds reinforcing optimism, though traders remain watchful of potential pullbacks near $111,000 and broader macroeconomic risks.
title: Crypto Market Cap Crosses $4 Trillion as Bitcoin, Ethereum Rally

description: Google has announced the expansion of Gemini's features to the Drive apps on Android and iOS. This integration allow users to interact with their files and folders by asking questions and receiving conversational responses. The update lets you summarise documents, discuss topics, and draw details across files on mobile. Until now, the feature was limited to the web.
title: Google Brings 'Collaborate with Gemini' Tools to Google Drive on iOS, Android

description: A tipster has provided the first look at the upcoming Honor Magic 8 Pro via alleged hands-on images. The handset features a similar design to its standard counterpart, including the large circular camera island at the back of the phone. It is seen with a quad curved screen and a curved back panel. One of the images also hints it may come with FuntouchOS 15, 16GB of RAM, and 1TB of storage.
title: Honor Magic 8 Pro Alleged Hands-On Images Reveal Circular Camera Island, Curved Design

description: OnePlus 15 is set to be the Chinese smartphone maker’s next flagship handset, succeeding last year’s OnePlus 13. The phone is confirmed to be powered by the latest Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset. The design of the handset, along with its Sand Dune colourway, has already been revealed by the China-based tech firm. Now, a YouTuber has posted a gaming review of the OnePlus 15, putting the phone’s chipset through different benchmark tests.
title: OnePlus 15 Gaming Review Detailing Hardware Performance Published Ahead of October Launch

description: OpenAI has rolled out new parental controls for ChatGPT, weeks after first announcing them in response to concerns around minors’ safety. The controls let parents link accounts with teenagers, restrict features like Voice Mode and image generation, and set Quiet Hours. All teen accounts also get stricter safeguards by default, with OpenAI also building distress notifications for parents.
title: OpenAI Introduces Parental Controls for Minor ChatGPT Users, Lets Parents Link Accounts

description: Samsung Galaxy S25 FE debuted in India earlier this month, and now the phone has gone on sale in the country. The phone is powered by an Exynos 2400 SoC, paired with up to 8GB of RAM and up to 512GB of onboard storage. It features a triple-rear camera setup, headlined by a 50-megapixel main shooter. The phone is available in three storage variants and three new colourways.
title: Samsung Galaxy S25 FE With Exynos 2400 Chip Goes on Sale in India: Offers, Specifications

description: Silent Hill f, Konami's newest survival-horror game, has sold one million copies worldwide. The game reached the sales milestone in just a day after it launched, the publisher said. Silent Hill f is also selling faster than last year's Silent Hill 2 remake, Konami confirmed.
title: Silent Hill F Sells 1 Million Copies; Game Selling Faster Than Silent Hill 2 Remake, Says Konami

description: OpenAI has introduced agentic shopping capability to ChatGPT with the new Instant Checkout feature. Presently, it is available to all ChatGPT users in the US, whether they are ChatGPT Plus, Pro, or free users. Initially, people will be able to use the Instant Checkout feature for products listed by Etsy sellers. Soon, the company would also allow users to buy products within the chatbot from Shopify merchants, too.
title: ChatGPT Now Lets Users Shop Without Leaving the Chat Window With New Instant Checkout Feature

description: Moto X70 Air is confirmed to launch in China next month. The upcoming handset is teased to come with a slim build, and it is likely to rival the iPhone Air and Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge models. Motorola is yet to confirm the specifications of the phone, but it is expected to ship with Qualcomm's latest Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset.
title: Moto X70 Air Launch Timeline Confirmed; Could Rival iPhone Air, Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge With Slim Profile

description: Vivo has confirmed the launch of the Vivo V60e in India and shared details about some of the specifications. The handset will come with a dual rear camera system, headlined by a 200-megapixel main sensor with OIS. It is confirmed to get AI features like AI Image Expander, AI Captions, Gemini, and AI Festival Portrait. The handset will pack a 6,500mAh battery.
title: Vivo V60e Confirmed to Launch in India With 200-Megapixel Main Camera, 6,500mAh Battery

description: Apple has rolled out the iOS 26.0.1 update for iPhone. It carries fixes for several bugs and glitches discovered in the stable iOS 26 release that was released earlier this month. As per Apple, iOS 26.0.1 resolves Bluetooth and Wi-Fi disconnection issues on the iPhone 17 series and the iPhone Air. There are also fixes for bugs related to the cellular network, artefacts occurring in photos, blank icons after adding a custom tint, and more.
title: Apple Releases iOS 26.0.1 Update With Fixes for Bluetooth, Camera, and Cellular Issues on iPhone 17 and iPhone Air

description: WhatsApp has announced several new features for its app. Users can now share Live Photos on iOS and Motion Photos on Android via the app, complete with sound. Further, Meta AI can be used to generate chat themes. Similarly, background for video calls can be created using text prompts. WhatsApp has introduced new sticker packs, support for document scanning on Android, and an easier group search function.
title: WhatsApp Announces Support for Sharing Live Photos, Meta AI-Powered Chat Themes, New Sticker Packs, and More

description: The Gigabyte AORUS Master 16 has a premium and sleek design language. The laptop features a 14-inch 3K OLED display that offers decent colour reproduction. It also features a powerful AMD Ryzen AI 9 HX 370 processor that delivers powerful performance, while the Nvidia GeForce RTX 5070Ti provides a seamless gaming experience.
title: Gigabyte Aorus Master 16 Review: OLED Brilliance Meets Powerful Graphics and Distracting Fan Noise
